meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ron Roberts Molly Rosenbusch Eureka Nutt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6077.

div.div: IBM Challenge mini-documentary: "What is a Grand Challenge?"

td.p: Ron Roberts, a poker impresario from Pompano Beach, Florida
Molly Rosenbusch, a night court clerk from Twin Lakes, Idaho
Eureka Nutt, a paralegal from Canoga Park, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $38,701)

tr.td: A MAN, A PLAN, A CANAL... ERIE!
CELEBRITIES & RACING
NEWSMAKERS OF 2010
TAROT CARDS
AKA
(Alex: Also known as.)
SOMETHING "MORE"
(Alex: Each correct response will end in those 4 letters.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This New York governor was the man & "DeWitt" behind the Erie Canal')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This New York governor was the man & "DeWitt" behind the Erie Canal

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Alex: Yeah, and he won the race, too, darn it.)

Keanu Reeves

Molly
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Alex reads from the cockpit of a race car at the Toyota Pro/Celebrity Race in Long Beach, CA.) I\'m not praying--I\'m just psyching myself up for this Toyota Pro/Celebrity Race because I\'m gonna face a field that includes this movie star who played the lead... the lead in "Speed"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Alex reads from the cockpit of a race car at the Toyota Pro/Celebrity Race in Long Beach, CA.) I'm not praying--I'm just psyching myself up for this Toyota Pro/Celebrity Race because I'm gonna face a field that includes this movie star who played the lead... the lead in "Speed"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(Molly: Who was Barack Obama?)
(Eureka: Who was the Pope?)
(Alex: The Pope? Be more specific.)
(Eureka: Pope [*]?)
(Alex: More specific. ...All right, we\'ll give it to you. There\'s only one Pope, and his name is [*].)

Benedict

EurekaMolly
')
